title: Japanese inspired Zwift Yumezi adds new Makuri Islands to the virtual cycling world
content:
Zwift has a whole new world in the works, with the fantastical new Makuri Islands delivering a fresh new destination to train indoors on your own, or to ride virtually with friends. First up in the new fictional locale is an all-new Yumezi course. Inspired by historical Japan, it includes everything from dirt tracks to [â€¦]

The post Japanese inspired Zwift Yumezi adds new Makuri Islands to the virtual cycling world appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Cory Benson
